 * Var name
  * Capital letter for each words.
  * Words are collapsed.
  Example : 
  <code langage="lua">local Variable
local MyVariable = false
local TooLongVarNameOfDoom</code>
 * End of instruction
  * *None* aka *no* <code langage="lua">local Var = 0;</code>
 * Functions name
  * No-capital letter on the first word.
  * Each words are collapsed.
  * Capital letter at the begin of each words.
  * Object Name act like variables.
  Example:<code langage="lua">local function()
end
local myFunction()
end
local arandomFunction(Var, OtherVar)
end
Meta:function()
end
local EntityInQuestion:thefunctionName()
end</code>
 * Arrays act like variables
 Example: <code langage="lua">local Array = {}
Array.Key = 12</code>
* Comments
 * In line defined by <code langage="lua">--</code>
 Example :<code langage="lua">-- Some Commented line</code>
 * Multi-line comments <code langage="lua">--[[ ... ]]--</code>
 Example :<code langage="lua">--[[ some
multi
line
comment]]--</code>
